page.title: 08GROWTH OF CROSSGATES 2
page.content: There is little employment in Crossgates itself,and there are only a few industries in the area.Those are: {Crawfords Potato Merchant,a Plastic {Factory,Reids the Builders,}and various garages,employing few people. Crossgates is classed as a{dormitory} settlement,meaning that its inhabitants are{Comuters}and travel to surrounding towns to work,taking advantage of the excellent road links it has.To the west of the village is the{M90}motorway between{Perth}and{ {Edinburgh}.{Dunfermline}is only a five minute drive away.A new dual carriage way is being built, which by- passes Crossgates, taking the exeptionally heavy traffic from its roads.This will provide an excellent road link with{Lochgelly}and{Kircaldy. {
